name: Car Soccer!
description:
Download and compete in the arcade-style soccer and car game! Customize your car, hit the field, and compete in one of the most critically acclaimed sports games of all time! Download and take your shot!
Hit the field by yourself in SOLO 1v1, DUO 2v2, and TRIO 3v3 Online Modes Unlock items in Soccer Pass, enjoy cross-platform progression, and more! The field is waiting. Take your shot!


Drive your car across the soccer field, defend your goal, and hit the ball to score and beat your opponent. There are no rules or referees.


Taking inspiration from soccer, cars, and retro arcade, Car Soccer is a completely unique arcade sports game. Jump in to play an action-packed 5-minute match that is very intense.


CUSTOMIZE YOUR PLAYER CAR
Choose how you want your car to look:
• From a long list of cars
• Amazing Boost trails
• Wear a hat as you drive
• Show an amazing explosion when you score
• Communicate efficiently using emojis


PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY!
Car Soccer relies heavily on your personal skill. Do you prefer defense, offense, or a more balanced approach? Plan out your strategy in the field by customizing your car. Also, don't forget to upgrade your player boost, on your player profile.



BE THE BEST!
• Level up and make your way across getting new Trophy badges.
• Rise to the top of the leaderboard by gaining trophies from matches.
- Get your name on top of the leaderboard,
- Score goals, and raise trophies to get into the all-time leaderboard.


Ready to become the next STAR PLAYER? Download Car Soccer now for free and take your shot!
